text: I opened a new PR (<https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/pull/29>) to fix sawtooth transaction list command bug. Reviews of anyone are welcome.

attachments.title: Fix sawtooth transaction list command bug by feihujiang · Pull Request #29 · hyperledger/sawtooth-core · GitHub
attachments.text: Before this PR, "sawtooth_xo", or "mktplace.transactions.market_place" etc TransactionFamilies loaded, when using "sawtooth transaction list" command, it would crash. Throws "update = trans_info["U...
